text: Jacques Remiller (born April 13, 1941 in Condrieu) was a member of the National Assembly of France, representing Isère's 8th constituency from 2002 to 2012 as a member of the Union for a Popular Movement. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:People from Condrieu Category:Mayors of places in Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes Category:Union for French Democracy politicians Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:The Popular Right Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Jacques Remiller
